headline: Apple is reportedly losing $1 billion a year on its streaming service as churn levels increase
summary: Apple's streaming platform is losing a reported $1 billion a year as separate data showed a recent uptick in the number of users canceling their subscription plans.

headline: Comcast Expands Internet Services to Communities in Southeast, GA
summary: Comcast connected nearly 6,700 new homes and businesses in Mt. Vernon, Wrightsville, Soperton, Adrian, Glenwood, and Alamo, GA to reliable, high-speed Internet. This expansion into the region will enhance digital infrastructure, promote economic growth, and position residents and local businesses for success in an increasingly digital world. The network expansion brings Internet, mobile, and security services from Xfinity and Comcast Business to residents and businesses for the first time.

headline: A+E Global Media Selects FreeWheel to Power Advertising Evolution on Heels of Its Strategic Expansion Announced at Upfronts
